DOC.brief_summary: This is a developmental project with two phases. The first phase will adapt an existing web-based intervention to incorporate mind-body exercises to develop a multi-modal intervention to promote physical activity in patients with COPD and HF. The second phase will pilot test this new intervention in a longitudinal study (subjects randomized to intervention or usual care).
DOC.brief_title: Mindful Steps: Coupling Technology and Mind-Body Exercise to Facilitate Physical Activity in Chronic Cardiopulmonary Disease
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of COPD OR clinical diagnosis of HF syndrome (New York Heart Association Class 13) Able to participate in an exercise program Have an active email account and access to a computer with internet connection COPD or HF exacerbation in the previous month Inability to ambulate Clinical signs of unstable cardiovascular disease Hypoxemia during 6MWT Inability to collect at least 7 of 14 days of baseline step counts Current participation in a cardiac or pulmonary rehabilitation program.
